statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT customer_name, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 2
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' AND feedback_date < '2022-04-01'
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_name HAVING total_feedback > 3
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_feedback DESC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 12345 AND rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) >= 4
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, sender_id FROM feedback WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE product_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT reviews.customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM reviews JOIN feedback ON reviews.product_id = feedback.receiver_id WHERE reviews.rating >= 4;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name, category FROM products ORDER BY category DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, feedback_text FROM feedback UNION SELECT customer_id, product_id, review_text FROM reviews ORDER BY sender_id ASC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, star_rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE star_rating > 3;
SELECT product_id, AVG(star_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, product_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 101 AND product_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE star_rating IN (1, 2) ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, star_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE star_rating >= 4;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, SUM(positive_feedback_count) AS total_positive_feedback FROM product_feedback_analysis GROUP BY customer_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_scores ORDER BY overall_satisfaction_score DESC, feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_reviews > 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM review WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, survey_question FROM survey WHERE LENGTH(response) > 10 ORDER BY survey_id;
SELECT review_id, product_id, review_text FROM review WHERE customer_id = 1 ORDER BY review_id DESC;
